sourcesContent:
import styled from "styled-components" import { colors, fontSize, fontWeight, spacing } from "../variables" const FormSection = styled.section` margin-bottom: ${spacing.sectionSpacing}; ` const FormWrapper = styled.form` display: flex; flex-direction: column; ` const FormLabel = styled.label` font-size: ${fontSize.text}; color: ${colors.PRIMARY}; font-weight: ${fontWeight.bold}; ` const FormInput = styled.input` border-radius: 6px; border: 1px solid ${colors.TERCIARY}; height: 2rem; margin-left: 1rem; ` const FormButton = styled.button`` const FormTextArea = styled.textarea`` export const Contact = () => { return (
Nome
E-mail Telefone
Mensagem ) }
